alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 2:12AM EST until January 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may drop between one half and one mile at times in heavier bands of snow later this morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions. &&
